column3: juicy and fell off the bone. They give you extra sauce and it was probably the best BBQ sauce I've ever had. I wanted to stick a straw into it and drink it. The cornbread was so warm
column4: the crust was perfect and the bread was moist. It and the mac and cheese
column7: both came in these little aluminum containers that were the perfect size. Anymore and it would've been overkill. The slaw was vinegar-based
column9: so it was interesting and different
column10: but in a great way. For 5 people
